name: Pets of the Homeless
description: Free veterinary care and pet food assistance for people experiencing homelessness
fullDescription: Pets of the Homeless is a nonprofit providing free veterinary care and pet food to pets of people experiencing homelessness.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free veterinary care through participating providers
- Free pet food at distribution sites
- Emergency veterinary assistance
- Directory of homeless-friendly pet resources
- No proof of homelessness required at most sites
howToGetIt:
1. Visit petsofthehomeless.org
2. Use the locator to find participating providers near you
3. Contact the provider directly for services
4. Bring your pet during operating hours
5. Most services are first come, first served
keywords: Pets of the Homeless, homeless pet help, free vet care, free pet food, emergency pet, street pet, unhoused, pet assistance
